'''Beta 1.18.30.30''' (Windows, Android, Xbox) or '''Preview 1.18.30.31''' (Windows, iOS, iPadOS, Xbox) is the tenth beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.18.30]], released on March 25, 2022,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/5082403383309|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.18.30.30/31|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=March 25, 2022}}</ref> which fixes a critical bug regarding corrupted chunks.

== Fixes ==
* Addressed an issue from the last beta that caused chunks below y=0 to become corrupted. ({{bug|MCPE-153316}})
**The chunks will no longer become corrupted but any chunk that was affected will revert to its original world generation.</onlyinclude>
